casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William E. TUCKER. No. 218P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of May 2008 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
